website_summaries.verdict: About half the price of other pack 'n' plays with several convenient features – hands down the best model for budget-conscious parents.
pros: A lightweight and portable design at a value price
Stands out for its rotating changer and easy-to-fold design
cons: It has less storage capacity compared to more expensive models, but for the value price you probably won't mind

customer_reviews.title: We have some other Evenflo products and have been happy with them
customer_reviews.text: We waited until my daughter was 18 months old to order a pack'n'play because I was under the impression that they were all very expensive. We have some other Evenflo products and have been happy with them, so though the low price of this worried me, I decided to give it a whirl. I'm really glad we did! My parents-in-law have a hand-me-down Eddie Bauer pack'n'play, and I think this one is way better. It's lighter, easier to assemble and break down, and it seems perfectly sturdy. We don't use it a ton, because my daughter doesn't like to be confined, but it's perfect when I need to take a quick shower or run the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: First off this is super cute and the colors were exactly what i was ...
customer_reviews.text: First off this is super cute and the colors were exactly what i was hoping for, 2nd you really dont need instructions, but for me a step by step picture book would have been a tad more helpful, I love the raised pad concept so my daughter will be more accessible. I recieved a different side pouch than what was pictured online, and on the box, and it took me forever to figure out that it goes on the opposite side as the changing pad, theres a thin black strip that has hidden holes for the side pouch straps to go in, once i figured that out i didnt feel the need to pull my hair out lol
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Thought with the Evenflo name it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Thought with the Evenflo name it would be decent for the price. Not the case. First, ours arrived broken. A snap was missing for the changing table and without it the changing table could not be used. Second, the overall feel was very cheap and poorly built. Materials were course and it was difficult to assemble and get all the parts locked in place. The bassinet base was very hard, almost no cushion at all. We had intended to use this as a gift but are glad we pulled it out to look at it first as we ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Trophy Husband

customer_reviews.title: and it looks great, easy to travel with and works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for travelling out of state, as a second pack n play, and it looks great, easy to travel with and works as intended. Definitely need to buy the mattress for it if your little one is going to be sleeping in it though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for baby to use it.
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research and YouTube videos I went with this pack-in-play. I love the colors of it and we will be getting a lot of use out of it. I never had such a fancy one since the last one I had was from 2010. Love that the changing table can be moved with only unclipping the safety straps and the diaper supplies organizer is awesome. It holds a whole small pack of newborn diapers with ease.
customer_reviews.author: B.Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. It took us a while to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. It took us a while to put this playard together. Even after that changing table was still falling off it. We are not able to use it. I got it for my newborn daughter, so I was hoping to use its elevated level at the beginning, however, metal parts are so rigid and padding is so thing that baby simply feels truly uncomfortable laying in it. We ended up bying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby girl! She’s able to take naps wherever I take this. It’s lightweight, small but in a good way. Not bulky, really a good cute play pen.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Velez

customer_reviews.title: Feels like its going to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: This system is adorable but that's about everything positive I can say about it. It is so cheaply made if feels like it is going to fall apart. The system was easy to put together but as soon as we moved it into our daughters room it literally felt like it was going to collapse on itself. I bought this for the looks and bc I thought evenflo was a trustworthy name but I wouldn't trust this pack n play to hold my child.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sweder

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist Mommy gives it two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Do you know how hard it is to find baby gear without a bunch of stupid designs all over it? Sheesh. I just wanted something simple and clean (but the Joovy play pen is way too expensive to justify). So happy to have found this! Easy to assemble, easy to clean and find mattress and sheets for, and doesn't have crazy geometric patterns all over it. And it actually breaks down to fit back into the bag it came in, which is pretty unusual.
customer_reviews.author: Monet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my sister-in-law (and niece on the way) and she loves it! This was better designed than a Graco pack-n-play we bought a couple of years ago. This one has several attachments and is designed to grow with the child. It's super cute too, so we recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: Economical, does the job
customer_reviews.text: For the price, does it's job but not recomended to sleep in consistently. The bottom is week and buckles in.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Labeled open box, new. Not "new".
customer_reviews.text: The description mentioned opened box but new. When I opened the box, there was what looked like white animal fuzz and hair. It looks like it was set up and rolled around and then put back in the box. I would not consider it "new" since it had been purchased or used. It will be used for my little dog so I am okay with it. I would be sending it back if it was for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: How to lock side rails and diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: Took me 10 minutes to assemble..I couldn’t locate the directions but if you’re not a first time parent and have put one of these things together before it should be easy. A lot of other reviews say the side rails wouldn’t lock, well you have to push the center down first in order for the rails to lock. Unlike the picture advertisement the diaper caddy goes on the opposite side of where the changing pad is, it hooks on with the velcro straps and seems sturdy. Overall great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend !
customer_reviews.text: Love this playyard ! I’m staying at my in laws and this play yard has been so helpful. It’s very sturdy and the perfect size for my twins
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: this product has been great. I have used it as a temporary crib ...
customer_reviews.text: this product has been great. I have used it as a temporary crib for my newborn until we mover her into the nursery in another month or so. the changing table folds out of the way and is very easy to use. I would buy this item again with out a second thought if i ever need another one. my only problem i had was with the hanging bag for the diapers and wipes. I couldn't figure out how i was supposed to attach it to the frame and the instructions were nowhere to be found. other than that it would have been five stars
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wardell

customer_reviews.title: Inside liner is not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our vacation for our 9 month old daughter. Wanted something nice but not super expensive. It seems kind of cheesy. First, and my biggest complaint is the floor pad is too small, does not properly fit the bottom which also makes the sheer to big. This makes this potentially unsafe. Also the floor pad is so thin & flimsy my poor baby woke up from the first nap with red marks & pressure points all over her face & upper torso. Slept overnight very restless. I read the reviews after purchasing ing the product & being disappointed. Then I saw the reviews saying it ripped, that doesn't surprise me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: cheap play pen
customer_reviews.text: No I would not buy this. It was a waste of money. The material shredded where the sides meet the bottom. Both ends shredded and made large holes for my grandson to step through. He is not over the age or weight requirements! We only had it a few months! I always liked this company but this play pen is a waste of money unless you plan to buy a new one every few months. Unfortunately we waited to long to report or return and can not get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: pfoilga

customer_reviews.title: Small, I like it
customer_reviews.text: Read carefully the description before buying, I didn’t realize it was only 30 pound limit. Thought my toddler would be able to sit in too with my baby, but guess not. It’s okay, not a deal breaker. Otherwise I like how small it is, and wash to move around and my 9 month old seems to love it. When you set up, our the sides down first to lock then the bottom middle part, I had a struggle figuring that one out. Took me a min. Otherwise very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the first one on amazon prime day because it was a good deal, only to take it down and put ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars then I would. Purchased the first one on amazon prime day because it was a good deal, only to take it down and put it up that it had broken and couldn't be put back up safely. Amazon was awesome about returning and sending a new one however the second one was put up twice and when trying to set up the third time the same exact piece had broken on the underside. What is the point of calling it portable if whenever you take it down it breaks? Very cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Critical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not as easily closed as a Graco, & thin weak mattress that is too small.
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever owned a portable playpen before, you'd know what I mean. Unlike the Graco, the Evenflo mattress is too small for the crib and there are gaps. The floor of the playpen sags toward the middle too, because the support underneath the playpen is lower in the middle than it is in the corners. Closing it is trickier than a Graco, and trying to wrap the mattress around the closed playpen is almost impossible...it isn't big enough to go all the way around so I have to sit on it, and I'm sure the velcro I struggle to attach will rip sooner than later as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great product for its price. Portable and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old will only sleep in a playpen at home so when she stayed with her grandparents for a month and there was no playpen there, she had a crying fit every nap and bedtime until we bought this playpen and set it up at their house. It was extremely easy to set up. The only thing is...without a mattress insert it is uncomfortable to sleep in, so we purchased a mattress that fits separately. When it was time to leave, the playpen folded up into a small bag... perfectly portable. I would recommend this for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah329

customer_reviews.title: Took a couple try’s to assemble but....
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple try’s to assemble but After we got the hang of it it was pretty easy to set up. Overall very happy with bassinet! Only thing that is keeping me from giving out a 5 star rating is that we couldn’t figure out where to attach the diaper holder. We tried to follow the image And looked for different snaps and placements but it was nowhere to be found so we just tossed it. Not a big deal for us as we have a separate diaper caddy and would be using this bassinet for travel anyways. Totally recommend ! Sturdy, great changing table and not too big!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to put together and our daughter had taken naps in it here and there. We just went on our first vacation and took this with us for our 5 month old to sleep in. Well, it kept caving in on her. We took it down, put it back up... over and over again. The thing in the middle of every pack and play will not lock in place. We just sleep trained this little girl and had to have her in bed with us all week because this thing is just not safe. Very disappointed and angry that this is even on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping time
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping time.. came in perfect condition, easy assembly, light and bright and it can fit thru the doorways in my house as long as I don't put the wheels on.. Easy to take down as well into a small bundle. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good for permanent setup
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our newborn and generally like it. He's been comfortable in it and it has a lot of features. The issues we had were setup is fairly complex and not well explained. Because of that, it's not something we'd suggest trying to travel with because it takes quite awhile to take down and get setup again. It's a great product when left in room for good, but definitely not the product I'd suggest if looking for something portable.
customer_reviews.author: PCN

customer_reviews.title: Great product but does not setup as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Great product but bizarre assembly. Pictures on amazon when I purchased show diaper caddy on side with diaper changing mat.. except that’s not how it’s assembled on the one we got. The diaper changing caddy is on the complete opposite side of the changing mat. Making it sort of dangerous to take your body/hands away from baby to go get diaper supplies from other side. Really bizarre. I know it’s not our error because setup is self explanatory with snaps on one side for changing mat and Velcro attachment on other side for caddy. All shown in my pictures. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Reed

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability. Not worth the $. Have not even had a response to my previous email from the company
customer_reviews.text: We bought this play yard approximately 1 year ago, but hadn’t taken it out and set it up until 3 months ago. But after about 2 months of use, the bottom stitching by the wheel/base has come undone...approximately 3-4 inches worth. Then I noticed last night that another side, down by the wheel/base has stitching that is coming undone as well...so far it’s about 1 inch so far. I emailed the company about 1-2 weeks ago, but have had no response as of yet. Extremely frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Jones

customer_reviews.title: A good investment!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this pack and play! We are still using the bassinet part. Even my 2 yr old gets in there and takes a nap. It's good to have around to keep baby safe! The colors are bright and is true to stock photos.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble and there are no videos to help fromnthe manufacturers
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pack n play especially for the price but I don't love the newborn insert it has a stiff board in it. I also HATED putting this thing together my other 2 kid's had the Graco ones and they were much easier to set up. It is durable and adorable though and we'll get good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Crys91

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I did not listen to some of the reviews that said you could not put the mat in with only one person. Well, I did just fine, you need to tip it lengthwise and do one side at a time, it works fine. I believe it will be perfect for what I need it for. I will give it more than 4 stars if it meets my expectations in the following weeks. But as far as I can see, the quality is fine, yes the pad is thin, but it's not a crib and Evenflo does make a mattress to fit if you want one. My advice...this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Penney G. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Several people mentioned they couldn't get the ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Several people mentioned they couldn't get the diaper caddy attached to the bassinet end of the crib, as shown in the picture. That's because despite the picture and what the instructions say, it is made to attach to the other end of the crib - opposite the bassinet end, Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: CasaZuzu

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a graco pack n play before this one and I’m really sorry I didn’t just buy another graco. This thing is awful. The bottom doesn’t fit all the way across so I had to put a rolled up blanket on one end. Then in short order it torn, so now there’s a big hole on one side. It’s not easy to pack down. You have to work at the buttons and arms to get them down. It’s just a real piece of junk. I’m going back to graco.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina W.

customer_reviews.text: Okay so.. we have had this for a few months now, the sides are ripping apart, we had to sew it, it still ripped apart after that, I regret not buying another Graco. The quality of this pack n play is disappointing. Make the quality better and this would be a great pack n play! It's cute and a great color, the changer and bassinet work just fine, just the stitching is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: PUT WHEELS, foot pieces on BEFORE opening. Instructions in pouch on back of mattress
customer_reviews.text: This pack and play is okay. The search for instructions was the first sign of less than a perfect piece of equipment. Once found it is much easier to proceed. You cannot open and stabilize the play yard before installing the feet and wheels. You must lock the sides before opening the play yard. It looks nice but doesn’t feel as sturdy as the Graco product. It seems okay for casual and occasional use. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: mary margaret

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in a different bedroom for my 1 year old to take naps in (my husband works nights and sleeps during the day) I've used it exactly 2 times and each time when I go to get my daughter out of it, she's got the mattress pushed to one side and is sitting on the bottom. The mattress does not fit at all. Total hazard. I wish I could send it back but it wouldn't be worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart. In WEEKS. It quite literally fell apart at the seams. My baby is normal weight, strength, disposition. The bottom is literally coming apart. After using the restroom, I found my baby stuck. If anything would have happened, I would have sued. It is sicken to think how dangerous this is. It is definitely a strangulation risk. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my living room when my 4th baby comes this June. From what I can tell when I set it up (to make sure I knew what needed to be done), it's pretty well made. The bassinet is zipped on the long sides, velcro on the corners, and hooks on the small sides by the corners. I feel that it is very secured, and it will be able to hold my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra.Austin

customer_reviews.title: Being a first time grandma I knew I needed to have one of these
customer_reviews.text: Reputable brand - sturdy, durable. Only used a handful of times while my granddaughter comes to town to visit. But I am sure I will get many more years of use from it as I have 4 children. easy to fold back up, put in protective bag and I am keeping the box to store it while not in use. Great buy for the product/price.
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: Nice all in one
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. takes a little more time to put together the first time since you are not sure how everything works, comes with good instruction which makes it much easier. once you did it once it will be a snap after that if you need to pack it up to move it. Also bought a Mattress for it when the baby gets older. it fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: R. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were wanting.
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this Evenflo Pack and Play. It is just what we were wanting, but, it did not come with assembly instructions or part descriptions. For two grandmas that have never used one of these, it was a bit challenging trying to figure out what and how all of the 'extra' parts fit together. Of course, once we did, it would have been a breeze to do it again. PLEASE INCLUDE INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.author: T L R

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Simple, and a must-have Baby Item!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, quality, simple. We got a mattress, as well, just to make it feel more like a real crib. But it's great. You don't need all those bells and whistles. This is a great, basic, must-have for traveling! I got it at half the price, I could've spent in any store too! We're very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Developed a rip
customer_reviews.text: This pack and play almost immediately developed a rip in the mesh. I have no idea how or when it happened. The hole in the mesh has gotten larger. I almost think that the tear was in the mesh when we got it. I’ve bought these before and had no problem. We are using it but very cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Comfortable and Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one specifically to travel with as the reviews said it was easier than our main one and it did not disappoint! We traveled 10 days and were at a different location almost every night and it was easy to pack up and assemble! My daughter slept great in it which is a major plus!
customer_reviews.author: Michalaks

customer_reviews.title: Graco’s Pack N Play is Simply Superior
customer_reviews.text: The crib’s aesthetics are on point and assembly is easy but breaking it down isn’t, it takes quite a bit of effort to get it folded right. The insert that the baby sleeps on needs to be secured with six straps, otherwise it shifts and the baby ends up directly on the crossbars, so a sheet cannot be placed on the insert. I prefer the Graco Pack N Play, the insert doesn’t need to be attached to the crib and the crib folds down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Great for two uses
customer_reviews.text: This pack-n-play is very cute and for the price it has a lot of accessories that come with it. It was easy to put together and take apart. We bought it for a trip, it was easy to transport and didn't take up much space. Unfortunately the base stopped locking after 2 uses. We have to put a weight in the bottom to keep it from popping back up. I've read that this is a fairly common problem so I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Missing important pieces of the product.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with product as a whole in the sense of quality, but had issues which includes not receiving everything supposedly included. Our package is missing the changer “changing table”, the toy bar, the dual pocket storage, and the wheels assembly. I’ve contacted the seller and waiting to hear back, but other than what was missing, I’m otherwise satisfied. It is somewhat cheap made and really lightweight parts not made of much, but it is a cheap product so all in all it did meet my expectations and I will be completely satisfied as soon as I get an exchange or receive missing pieces. New review will be written upon outcome of issue.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up!!!! Very pleased with this purchase for my grandchild because it arrived exactly as promised, set up was a breeze and the baby enjoyed it. Overall, it exceeded my expectations so I'm very happy I never bought the one at the blue box.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.text: When being used as a bassinet it is perfect. But once baby gets to big and you want to lay them in the bigger part it turns to crap. There is nothing supporting the mistress. My poor baby was sinking in and sliding to the sides. I had to had extra blankets underneath to actually make it SAFE to sleep in. Do not buy this. It’s cute but not efficient at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dara jameson

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to be the first bed for our new born but its not sturdy as other higher priced pack-n-play in the market are. Also, the build quality is medium. We eventually ended up getting a wooden crib ( which we didnt want initially as we will soon be moving countries). Came out with some broken peices but the seller was very helpful and resolved the issue quickly ( refund essentially)
customer_reviews.author: AnkurJ

customer_reviews.title: Ok.  May not be safe for smaller baby.
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as my cheaper Graco pack n play. I don't think the quality is as good but was looking for a nutral color that was inexpensive. This was it. The only problem I see is that the pad is a couple inches smaller than the pack and play and is slippery. I would not think this would be safe for a very young baby. Mine girl is 1.5 years so I'm not concerned. The pad is thin so adding a pack n play matress would solve both problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my 5 month old grandson safe but not left strapped in a carseat when I get to keep him for a few hours. I have had to assemble it while holding him and it is easy to do, it's a quick set up and quick take down. I don't have anything else to have him in and my floors are in need of replacement so I purchased this until my daughter finds his other bouncer/walker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen with a great price
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing this playpen. I had very little problem setting it up. I like the way it zippers along the inside vs the older style. I don't care for the changing station. My baby is all but 3 months old and she loves to look at the crinkle flowers on the bar. I would purchase again. Great playpen with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I can't complain. It is sturdy amd fulfills its purpose. It was easy to open and put together. You may meed a cushion if you plan to have your baby sleep on it since the flooring is pretty thin and hard.
customer_reviews.author: EVB

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up and no directions
customer_reviews.text: The product came with no directions after 3 YouTube videos and a google search I found one similar so I could get it put together. I struggled with the bassinet but once I got it up it seems good quality. I am only using this one downstairs in my home so I don’t have to go up and down. The releases need to be labeled and it should be much more clear that the one side needs to be put up before the other or you are screwed and can’t get it back down. So I think traveling would be difficult to set this up and take down
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to visit my great aunt. Had them shipped right to her house. They were so simple to set up and take down. Good quality and a decent price. We actually just used for our trip and then had her donate to her church. It was cheaper than paying to check on the airline there and back.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and much room!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this play pen! I purchased it when my grandbaby was about 6 months old to put next to my bed at night when he sleeps over. He is 17 months old now and still fits with tons of room and the quality has held up perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya theriot

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy bottom
customer_reviews.text: I like the diaper basket on the side and that it has a zip in bassinet. The piece that goes in the bottom of the pack and play is very flimsy and almost like a thick cardboard. My sister had an older Graco at our mom's house and I noticed that bottom piece was a lot more sturdy, so my child now 15 pounds makes the floor "cave-in" but in the one at my mom's house that doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K.

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up! Less than 40 min. Super cute, just like the picture. Suprised of the quality. Easy to move around, and very light. I recommend it to anyone who is planning a trip with babies, not that heavy and definitely looks great at home too. In love, and will most likely buy it again as a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Although the material is not of great quality, this Playard fulfills its objective, in my opinion, it is worth its price, but if the material were of better quality, I would be willing to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gil

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose, for my baby to play and roll around.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my 8 month baby girl, whom is very active. This is perfect for her to play with her toys and take little naps. For her naps I just threw in a sofa pillow and that helped. It looks great, love the color and it is sturdy. Very easy to assemble and small enough for traveling. I am very satisfied with this product as it serves its purpose and I like the quality. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dayanara Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: One word definition. Cheap. Flimsy. No instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: One word definition. Cheap. Flimsy. No instructions. Center post in bottom protrudes making the thing very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, spend a little
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but you get what you pay for. Def not as sturdy as my graco one and the boards bend already while my son is only 20 pounds and it says it goes to 30.
customer_reviews.author: Gian

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like depicted, and is pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like depicted, and is pretty sturdy, but was the hardest play pen I've ever assembled. Clicking the bars into position was very tricky and not recommended if you are 8 months pregnant and impatient.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Wright

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This pack and play was inexpensive and seemed comfortable for our toddler. She slept through the night every night on our vacation and didn’t seem to notice a difference from the pack and play to her crib. It was compact and easy to assemble. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: vivinguyen17

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe. Buy A Better Brand.
customer_reviews.text: This is so poorly made and I don’t think it’s safe at all for a child to use. They can easily pull up the bottom pad. I wouldn’t turn my back on a child in this thing. Complete waste of money and I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephiejo

customer_reviews.title: Seems okay
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with an instruction manual so it was a bit frustrating to put together. The diaper holder that came with mine was slightly different than the one pictured online. It had two Velcro strips instead of the plastic clips. I found that it attaches on the opposite side of the changing pad into two slits on the outside of the play pen (I tried to show that in the picture). It is lightweight, not too bulky and I like the color. Overall, I think it is a good product that will fit our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Useful with additional padding
customer_reviews.text: As described. Great for those on the go. Easily fits in the trunk. Requires some additional padding for the kiddo, would be way too uncomfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: vincent proctor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this pack n play. Perfect for Mom on the go or to have in the living room, next to the bed etc. love the changing table and the colors. My little girl sleeps very well in it and loves to see the hanging black and white flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks good. The mat to place at the bottle is pretty thin so I purchased a mattress separately. But for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Marchand

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Considering my cats have taken it over.... holds up well, easy to clean. A bit to set up but so far so good! Like the diaper changing area and the detachable organizer is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My own opinion is this was not easy to set up. The only reason I say that is the Velcro that holds the pad has to be threaded into the bottom. It could be used for travel but make sure you adjust the straps several times!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled with the gift! We assembled it with ease following the directions. Can not wait for baby to arrive and enjoy his new baby suite.
customer_reviews.author: T. Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS THING DOES NOT HOLD FOR ANYTHING ITS A DESIGN FLAW! IT WONT LOCK THIS THING CAN COLLAPSE! AND HURT YOUR BABY! IM CONTACTING A LAWYER RIGHT NOW! THE BARS WONT LOCK! THEY RELEASE SUPER EASY!
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: This pack n' play is so sturdy! I love all the attachments and that it has a bassinet since out baby is just 5 months. It's perfect for our living room and he can hang out in it while we eat breakfast and dinner. I would not say it's a quick break down and set up for travel but it's great to keep at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Nice just didn't have all the parts
customer_reviews.text: Really like but didn't have all the parts for the changing table thing or the bad that hold the diapers and wipes
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Portable, light weight, spacious
customer_reviews.text: Was a little tricky to set up and put together, but once you understand the instructions, this is a great product. Has a changing stand and diaper bag as well as adjustable bed. Would recommend 100% to expecting parents.
customer_reviews.author: Abm2485

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the for this product
customer_reviews.text: Quick & easy set up & break down. Simple basic model none of the bells & whistles Perfect for traveling or for if guests come
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to set up & take apart; not too bulky. I laid a thick blanket in there and my kid (9 months) sleeps/plays in it all the time. Be careful where you have it placed, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Crib
customer_reviews.text: Easy to step up. Great Value. We've been really happy with this purchase. Make sure you use the straps. Our daughter wiggles her way under the mattress if we forget to strap it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Please read instructions before installing. This playpen got stuck in place for hours before I had to call a male family member to fix it (get it unstuck) other than that easy to use once you get it working. Taking it down is a breeze. I haven't used on my baby yet due to Cosleeping but I certainly am when she gets a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this primarily to just sleep in because its more convenient for us at night. Easy enough to assemble and isn't too big or bulky. The basket is handy but the changing table is kinda in the way if installed. However, the mattress is flimsy and caved very easily. Had to replace it with a sturdier one.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Woodard

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this pack and play with the 3in mattress and a waterproof mattress pad and two fitted sheets that fit on the mattress. The quality is wonderful for $45 it cannot be beat. I am very pleased with this purchase and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Southern_lady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together still
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with instructions sometimes that happens at factory but did have the card to mail off in case of recall. Easy to put together still. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Gi Jane

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but good enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for the price but when you take it down and puT it back it, the locks get stuck sometimes and may have to redo it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good prody
customer_reviews.text: This playpen is not durable the bottom ripped all the way across and baby legs were handing out of it..... very scary.... I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product , although did'nt come with instructions, except whats printed directly on the product, the pouch on the side for the diapers, does not attach, like it shows in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dwyn Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Sterdy & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to get together because the instructions where placed in a weird pouch. But once together pretty eay to use. Sterdy.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett C Kirk

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, love Evenflo!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, simple, portable crib. We have owned 3 different styles from this brand and they were all great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Playpen. My little one slept in here until he was ready to transition to his crib. I would personally buy a padded mattress if your using it for naps. It also matches my car seat & stroller too!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Barber

customer_reviews.title: Not well built
customer_reviews.text: Developed two gaping holes in less than a year of use. The pad doesn’t fit flush to the edges and is kept in place with Velcro strap that don’t allow a sheet to fit properly on the pad.
customer_reviews.author: JDelai

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: This product came missing pieces. I couldn’t assemble it without the bottom folding up as if it would lock close. I don’t recommend. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Santa

customer_reviews.title: So far so good- simple & easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So far so good- simple & easy to set up. I love that the mattress attaches to the frame, makes for a sturdy support and snooze for my little one. My only complaint is that my open box item(this pack n play) arrived a little scuffed & it wasn’t notated when described.
customer_reviews.author: *NightOwlLady*

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Simple, low price, but not cheaply made. I am glad I went with this one vs the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: MrsCareBear

customer_reviews.title: It's a good thing to have
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack n play and all the attachments. Changing table could be more durable s d comfortable as well as the bassinet part. We make it work though. I take it everywhere with me!
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on name brands
customer_reviews.text: This pack n play works perfectly! I was a bit timid in buying a 3rd portable crib for my son to have in my boutique but I found this one and it has definitely been worth the money! We have a Graco also, and this one is so similar yet so much cheaper. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, they sent us a defective product. The upper handles don't snap into place like it should, so we couldn't use it. Had to borrow one from the hotel! I need a refund ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: ... Daughter Loves This Playpen The Price Was So Right Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter Loves This Playpen The Price Was So Right Easy To Install
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought it for my daycare and love that the mattress straps down for safety. The only downside is that I want another and one minute amazon says prime shipping and the next minute it says 1-3 weeks for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Mat sucks
customer_reviews.text: Love everything except the mat. Doesn't sit right and cant fold it back up. Its awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm stupid at the beginning I don't know how to open it. Oh my gosh. But it's high quality. Good
customer_reviews.author: Yima

product_meta.title: Evenflo Portable Babysuite Deluxe Playard, Koi
product_meta.description:
Color:KoiThe Evenflo Portable BabySuite Deluxe offers parents convenient space for Baby Care and Play. The new fashions and long list of amenities keep baby comfortable and look great doing it. The Rotate-to-Store changer and Full Size Bassinet keep baby's space convenient. The padded floor mat converts to Playtime Playmat with attachable toy bar to create a clean, safe play space for your baby. And when portability is necessary, the BabySuite Deluxe quickly folds and goes into the matching carry bag to make your travel a breeze.The playard offers a fabric console with storage compartments to store diaper-changing supplies and other essentials. Fabric is wipeable for quick, easy clean up. Mesh sides provide maximum ventilation.

BRAND STORY
By Evenflo
feature_bullets: Floormat converts to Playtime Playmat with toys to create a clean, safe play space for baby
Rotate-to-Store Changer rotates to the side when not in use
No lock hinges for easy set up and tear down
Dual-pocket fabric console for baby necessities
Lightweight with travel bag included for easy transport

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,637 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
